name.label: Camera Name
name.placeholder: Enter a unique name for your camera
name.tooltip: A unique identifier for your camera. Use only letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens.

enabled.label: Enable Camera
enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable this camera. When disabled, no streams will be processed but recordings will still be accessible.

path.label: Stream URL
path.tooltip: The RTSP, HTTP or other supported stream URL for your camera

roles.label: Stream Roles
roles.tooltip: Define how this stream will be used

global_args.label: Global Arguments
global_args.tooltip: Global FFmpeg arguments for this input stream

hwaccel_args.label: Hardware Acceleration
hwaccel_args.tooltip: Hardware acceleration arguments for this input stream. Use 'auto' for automatic detection.

input_args.label: Input Arguments
input_args.tooltip: FFmpeg input arguments for this stream

detect.label: Detection Output
detect.tooltip: FFmpeg arguments for the detection output stream

record.label: Recording Output
record.tooltip: FFmpeg arguments for the recording output stream

enabled.label: Enable Motion Detection
enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable motion detection for this camera. Required for object detection.

threshold.label: Detection Threshold
threshold.tooltip: The threshold for determining if a pixel has changed enough to be counted as motion. Higher values make detection less sensitive (1-255).

contour_area.label: Minimum Motion Area
contour_area.tooltip: Minimum size in pixels that counts as motion. Higher values prevent smaller movements from triggering detection.

frame_alpha.label: Frame Alpha
frame_alpha.tooltip: How quickly new objects are averaged into the background. Higher values mean faster averaging.

frame_height.label: Frame Height
frame_height.tooltip: Height of the resized motion frame. Higher values give more detailed motion detection but use more CPU.

improve_contrast.label: Improve Contrast
improve_contrast.tooltip: Enable dynamic contrast improvement. Helps with night detection but may increase false positives during the day.

mask.label: Motion Mask
mask.tooltip: Coordinates to mask out areas from motion detection. Format: x1,y1,x2,y2,...

error.invalid: Invalid mask format. Use x,y coordinates between 0 and 1.

enabled.label: Enable Object Detection
enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable object detection for this camera. Requires motion detection to be enabled.

width.label: Detection Width
width.tooltip: Width of the frame for object detection. Lower values use less CPU but may miss small objects.

height.label: Detection Height
height.tooltip: Height of the frame for object detection. Lower values use less CPU but may miss small objects.

fps.label: Detection FPS
fps.tooltip: Frames per second for object detection. Higher values are more accurate but use more CPU.

min_initialized.label: Minimum Initialized Frames
min_initialized.tooltip: Number of consecutive detection hits required before tracking an object
min_initialized.description: Higher values reduce false positives but may miss quick-moving objects

max_disappeared.label: Maximum Disappeared Frames
max_disappeared.tooltip: Number of frames without detection before stopping object tracking
max_disappeared.description: Higher values track objects longer but may cause false tracking

zones.title: Detection Zones
zones.empty: No zones configured. Click the + button to add a zone.

visual.instructions: Click to add points. Drag points to adjust. Upload an image or video to help with zone placement.

name.label: Zone Name
name.placeholder: Enter a unique name for this zone

coordinates.label: Zone Coordinates
coordinates.tooltip: Define the zone area using x,y coordinates
coordinates.description: Enter coordinates as x,y pairs between 0 and 1, separated by commas. The coordinates form a polygon.

inertia.label: Inertia
inertia.tooltip: Number of consecutive frames required for an object to be considered present in the zone

loitering_time.label: Loitering Time
loitering_time.tooltip: Number of seconds that an object must remain in the zone to trigger loitering detection

enabled.label: Enable Recording
enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable recording for this camera

days.label: Retention Days
days.tooltip: Number of days to keep recordings. Set to 0 to only retain recordings based on events.

mode.label: Retention Mode
mode.tooltip: Choose what type of recordings to retain

pre_capture.label: Pre-Capture Seconds
pre_capture.tooltip: Number of seconds to include before the event

post_capture.label: Post-Capture Seconds
post_capture.tooltip: Number of seconds to continue recording after the event

required_zones.label: Required Zones
required_zones.tooltip: Only record events when objects enter these zones

objects.label: Objects to Record
objects.tooltip: Only record events for these object types

enabled.label: Enable Snapshots
enabled.tooltip: Enable or disable snapshot capture for this camera

clean_copy.label: Save Clean Copy
clean_copy.tooltip: Save a clean PNG copy of the snapshot without annotations

bounding_box.label: Show Bounding Box
bounding_box.tooltip: Draw object bounding box on snapshots

crop.label: Crop to Object
crop.tooltip: Crop snapshots to focus on the detected object

height.label: Height
height.tooltip: Height to resize snapshots to. Width will be adjusted to maintain aspect ratio.

quality.label: JPEG Quality
quality.tooltip: Quality of the JPEG compression (1-100). Higher values mean better quality but larger file size.

default.label: Default Retention Days
default.tooltip: Number of days to keep snapshots by default

objects.label: Object-Specific Retention
objects.tooltip: Set different retention periods for specific object types

required_zones.label: Required Zones
required_zones.tooltip: Only save snapshots when objects are in these zones
